TopicTitle: Cancle vehicle deletion closes load window

Articles.Content:
• Go to VAB
  • Click on "Load vehicle"
  • select any vehicle
  • click "delete"
  • click "cancel" in warning popup
    -> the whole window closes

expected: only the popup closes
OR: no "cancel" button at all, since there is also a "don't delete" button

_______________________________________________________________
game version:
0.1.1.0.21572

OS:
Windows 11

GPU:
NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3090

CPU:
Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-12900K   3.20 GHz
